notification.title: Important information when performing a migration:

description.delete_user: The previous user "{old_user_name}" ({old_user_provider} authentication) will be deleted.
description.user_description:
Any running desktops will be stopped. 
The user's recycle bin will be emptied. 
The user's bookings will be deleted. 
Non-persistent desktops will be DELETED 
Resources (such as networks, RAM, CPU, GPUS) not allowed for the new user will be removed or restricted.
description.description:
Any running desktops will be stopped. 
The user's recycle bin will be emptied. 
The user's bookings will be deleted. 
Non-persistent desktops will be DELETED 
The list of co-owners in deployments will be deleted. 
Desktops belonging to other users in migrated deployments will remain intact. 
Resources (such as networks, RAM, CPU, GPUS) not allowed for the new user will be removed or restricted. 
If the destiny user has any matching name, the migrated items will have '(migrated)' added to their name.

accept.title: I understand and accept the risks associated with the migration process
accept.required: You must check this box to continue

error.title: There were errors in the migration process:

description.ok: Your items have been successfully migrated to the new account. You can now go back to the main page.
description.error: There were some errors during the process and some of your items haven't been migrated to the new account. Please contact an administrator. You can now go back to the main page.

errors.generic: There was an error while migrating your {type}, please contact an administrator.

errors.missing_category: A category needs to be selected
errors.rate_limit_date: Too many login attempts, please try again at {time}
errors.rate_limit: Too many login attempts, please try again later

errors.token_expired: The token you provided has expired
errors.invalid_token: The token you provided is invalid
errors.no_items_to_migrate: There are no items to migrate
errors.multiple_migrations_found_target_user: There are multiple migrations for the new user
errors.same_user_migration: You can't migrate to the same account. When obtaining the token, you must log out and log in with the new account
errors.different_category_migration: You can't migrate to an account from a different category
errors.role_migration_admin: You can't migrate from an admin account
errors.role_migration_user: You can't migrate to a user account from an account with a higher role
errors.migration_desktop_quota_error: The user has more desktops than the new user quota
errors.migration_template_quota_error: The user has more templates than the new user quota
errors.migration_media_quota_error: The user has more media than the new user quota
errors.migration_deployments_quota_error: The user has more deployments than the new user quota

errors.forbidden: The email domain you are trying to use is not authorized for your category.
